pages.text: At the bottom left of the HUD, the $(l)blue bar$() indicates the player's current $(l)Mana$().$(br2)Mana is used to activate and use player $(l)abilities$().$(br2)By default, the player's maximum $(l)Mana$() is $(l)100$().

pages.title: Mana
pages.text: $(br)Mana regenerates $(l)passively$() over time. The $(l)amount$() of Mana and its $(l)regeneration speed$() is seen in the $(l)statistics menu$().$(br2)Mana statistics can be $(l)enhanced$() by certain affixes on $(l:vault_gear/variants)$(t:Vault Gear)$(l)Vault Gear$() and $(l:vault_potions/variants)$(t:Vault Potions)$(l)Vault Potions$().
